name: Flareon ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Evolutionary Flame
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Flareon ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Flame Screen
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Flareon ex by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.effect: Flareon ex does 10 damage to itself.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
